description: Returns a list simulation job batches. You can optionally provide filters to retrieve specific simulation batch jobs.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filters to limit results. (dict) --- Information about a filter. name (string) --- The name of the filter. values (list) --- A list of values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: simulationJobBatchSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of simulation job batch summaries.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the batch.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the simulation job batch was last updated.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time, in milliseconds since the epoch, when the simulation job batch was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the simulation job batch.

nested_items.name: failedRequestCount
nested_items.description: The number of failed simulation job requests.

nested_items.name: pendingRequestCount
nested_items.description: The number of pending simulation job requests.

nested_items.name: createdRequestCount
nested_items.description: The number of created simulation job requests.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous paginated request did not return all of the remaining results, the response object's nextToken parameter value is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call ListSimulationJobBatches again and assign that token to the request object's nextToken parameter. If there are no remaining results, the previous response object's NextToken parameter is set to null.
